text:
[Verse]
Neon signs shining bright
City hums through the night
Lost in chaos feeling free
Just the lights and me

[Verse 2]
Sidewalk beats under feet
Strangers pass eye to eye meet
Lost in waves of the crowd
Heartbeats feeling loud

[Chorus]
Lost in the city lights
Dancing through endless nights
Skyscrapers touch the sky
In this world we fly

[Bridge]
Taxi horns sirens blare
Wind sweeps through my hair
Lost but I don't care
This city's got me there

[Verse 3]
Midnight snacks on the go
Street food in the glow
Wandering without a map
Embrace where I'm at

[Chorus]
Lost in the city lights
Dancing through endless nights
Skyscrapers touch the sky
In this world we fly
title: Lost in the City Lights
